DOCUMENT ()
  BEGIN_REGION (>>>DOCUMENT)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  title (title:: Simple Docum)
    string (title:: Simple Docum)
  id (id:: td-000001)
    string (id:: td-000001)
  COMMENT_BLOCK (####################)
  PARAGRAPH (The purpose of this )
    string (The purpose of this )
    italics_string (very)
      string (very)
    string ( simple document wit)
  END_REGION (<<<DOCUMENT)
